movie.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
movie.description_intro: Topper Harley is found working as an odd-job-man in a monastery. The CIA wants him to lead a rescue mission into Iraq, to rescue the last rescue team, who went in to rescue the last rescue team who... who went in to rescue hostages left behind after Desert Storm. The President is Tug Benson, who also likes to be in on the action. Basically, it's a send-up of all the big shoot-em-up Rambo/Robocop/T2/Commando-type movies.
movie.description_full: Topper Harley is found working as an odd-job-man in a monastery. The CIA wants him to lead a rescue mission into Iraq, to rescue the last rescue team, who went in to rescue the last rescue team who... who went in to rescue hostages left behind after Desert Storm. The President is Tug Benson, who also likes to be in on the action. Basically, it's a send-up of all the big shoot-em-up Rambo/Robocop/T2/Commando-type movies.

movies.title: The Thing
movies.summary: Paleontologist Kate Lloyd is invited by Dr. Sandor Halvorson to join his team who have found something extraordinary. Deep below the Antarctic ice, they have found an alien spacecraft that has been there for perhaps 100,000 years. Not far from where the craft landed, they find the remains of the occupant. It's cut out of the ice and taken back to their camp but as the ice melts, the creature reanimates and not only begins to attack them but manages to infect them, with team members devolving into the alien creature.

movies.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders: Huttsgalor Holiday
movies.summary: Odinyule, the feast of the Vikings sharing, begins with the snow. But if the Rescue Team does not step in, perhaps the tradition will be canceled due to extreme weather conditions.
movies.description_full: Odinyule, the feast of the Vikings sharing, begins with the snow. But if the Rescue Team does not step in, perhaps the tradition will be canceled due to extreme weather conditions.

movies.title: Naked Ambition 2
movies.summary: A sex comedy which parodies Japanese adult film industry through various iconic scenes with exaggerated expressions.
movies.description_full: A sex comedy which parodies Japanese adult film industry through various iconic scenes with exaggerated expressions.

movies.title: Serenity
movies.summary: Baker Dill (Matthew McConaughey) is a fishing boat captain leading tours off a tranquil, tropical enclave called Plymouth Island. His quiet life is shattered, however, when his ex-wife Karen (Anne Hathaway) tracks him down with a desperate plea for help. She begs Dill to save her - and their young son - from her new, violent husband (Jason Clarke) by taking him out to sea on a fishing excursion, only to throw him to the sharks and leave him for dead. Karen's appearance thrusts Dill back into a life he'd tried to forget, and as he struggles between right and wrong, his world is plunged into a new reality that may not be all that it seems.
